title: Church Complaints, BET Awards, Rihanna, Derek Chauvin and more.
itunes:title: Church Complaints, BET Awards, Rihanna, Derek Chauvin and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We just gon' keep wakin' up gettin' it. The CLO lays a woman's doubts to rest about her marriage and then Bitterman chimed in! Pastor Motown makes an executive decision about "The Boss" and his involvement with the July 4th festivities. Legends were honored and huge announcements were made in La La Land on Sunday. Lots of big things happened for the culture and the crew had their discussion. Fool #2 has the signs that you would know if you are a biker and you gained a little weight. Junior gives us an impressive list of star athletes that are from the Lone Star State. Derek Chauvin is facing more trouble. Someone spoke into their shoulder and made a mistake. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve gives out a big hand clap to all of OUR Queens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We just gon' keep wakin' up gettin' it. The CLO lays a woman's doubts to rest about her marriage and then Bitterman chimed in! Pastor Motown makes an executive decision about "The Boss" and his involvement with the July 4th festivities. Legends were honored and huge announcements were made in La La Land on Sunday. Lots of big things happened for the culture and the crew had their discussion. Fool #2 has the signs that you would know if you are a biker and you gained a little weight. Junior gives us an impressive list of star athletes that are from the Lone Star State. Derek Chauvin is facing more trouble. Someone spoke into their shoulder and made a mistake. Today in Closing Remarks, Uncle Steve gives out a big hand clap to all of OUR Queens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
